record.dc:title: 66HA3(B) Hixon Mound Site 1HA3, Hamilton Co., TN. Feature 11, Small rectangular post mold pattern in old occupation layer to east of mound 1HA3. Sq. 22L3. Three views [A, B, and C]. Direction south.
record.wpa:narrative: Posts set in narrow trenches. Raised platform denotes area of indurated floor. Outline of small rectangular structure. 4 interior corner posts and 6 interior posts; two and three along sides. All ten posts are conspicuously larger than the wall posts. Small wall posts set in trenches. Hard packed floor in eastern 1/3 of building. Two large exterior post molds about 5.0' west from SE to NE corners. One large post in middle in eastern third of structure. Partially burned soil on floor suggesting evidence of fireplace.
record.wpa:comments: Photographs 66HA3(A) [fhm00843] and 66HA3(C) [fhm00845] are of the same view and feature.
